mapper.insert: INSERT INTO device ( product_id, product_name, brand, model, color, capacity, price ) VALUES ( #{productId}, #{productName}, #{brand}, #{model}, #{color}, #{capacity}, #{price} )

INSERT INTO preorder_event ( event_id, event_name, start_time, end_time, preorder_type, benefit_description, max_order_per_user ) VALUES ( #{eventId}, #{eventName}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{preorderType}, #{benefitDescription}, #{maxOrderPerUser} )
mapper.select: SELECT d.product_id, d.product_name, d.brand, d.model, d.color, d.capacity, d.price FROM device d INNER JOIN event_device_map edm ON d.product_id = edm.product_id WHERE edm.event_id = #{eventId}
SELECT e.event_id, e.event_name, e.start_time, e.end_time, e.preorder_type, e.benefit_description, e.max_order_per_user, e.created_at FROM preorder_event e WHERE e.event_id = #{eventId}
mapper.update: UPDATE preorder_event SET event_name = #{event.eventName}, start_time = #{event.startTime}, end_time = #{event.endTime}, preorder_type = #{event.preorderType}, benefit_description = #{event.benefitDescription}, max_order_per_user = #{event.maxOrderPerUser} WHERE event_id = #{eventId}
